content: this pattern is a part of mosaic in a month afghan cal crochet-along further in the text cal **the cal is hosted by juniper & oakes crochet community on facebook 1 ** ** find more information about this cal 2 ** ** the entire bundle of the patterns of this cal can be purchased here 3 ** technique overlay mosaic crochet in row experience level advanced beginner language & terminology
